# ⚠️ STOP: Cloudflare Pages Auto-Deploy Disabled

This repository is **NOT** meant to be deployed via Cloudflare Pages.

## Correct Deployment Setup

✅ **GitHub Pages** - Hosts the website at https://arohaislove.github.io
✅ **GitHub Actions** - Deploys Cloudflare Workers automatically
❌ **Cloudflare Pages** - Should be DISABLED/DELETED

## If You're Seeing This Error

You likely have this repository connected to Cloudflare Pages. **Disconnect it immediately:**

1. Go to https://dash.cloudflare.com
2. Workers & Pages → Pages tab
3. Find and DELETE the project for this repository

See `/DEPLOYMENT.md` for detailed instructions.
